# Unity React Native Integration Project

This project creates a Unity package for React Native integration that demonstrates communication flows between Unity and React Native applications.

## Project Requirements
- Unity project with PostMessage communication
- JSON data sending every 5 seconds
- Button-triggered message sending
- Compatible with react-native-unity package

## Development Guidelines
- Use C# for Unity scripts
- Implement WebGL build target for React Native compatibility
- Focus on message passing and data communication
- Create simple UI for testing interactions
